interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: LANGE HAIR Extendé Conditioning Detangler Hair Spray - Paraben Free Leave-in Conditioner Spray, Detangles and Hydrates Hair, Moisture & Shine | 4OZ
Review Date: 2020/08/15
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Curly, Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Helps protect color and reinforces strands, leaving them strong and vibrant', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 1.4 x 1.4 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '793150592708'}
Review Text: I have the worst tangled hair ever from all the highlights and dying it I've done over the last 15 years. My hair is so damaged. And also because it is so long, it's almost impossible to manager. I also have a TON of hair. When I go to the salon, they usually have two people blow drying my hair. Anyhow, I have a detanger brush, I've bought hair mask, I've used leave in conditioner, and I've used different detanglers. (I've done the it's the 10 product also). I have to say I was very impressed with this bottle. Right off when I sprayed it, I noticed it came out different. It wasn't a spray, it was more of a mist spray so it sprayed more powerfully but evenly and wide. I used it right after I showered and towel dried my hair and then sprayed it and brushed. And it worked. i was able to detangle my hair. The only thing I wish was that this bottle was bigger. It's pretty small!
Review Title: detangled my highlighted 15 year damaged hair
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Hair Treatment Mask 120ml, 2019 PURC Magical Hair Mask, Deep Conditioner for Dry or Damaged Hair, 5 Seconds Repairs Damage Hair Root and Keratin GHEART {'Brand': 'GHEART', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Dull, Frizzy, Color Treated, Dry, Chemically Treated, Damaged', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '2.8 x 2.8 x 1.9 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Hair Treatment Mask-411', 'UPC': '778299243728'} I bought two masks to try out. This one for dry and damaged hair and a keratin one. First, I want to say my hair is very damaged. The top of my hair seems oily but the bottom is super dry. I buy regular conditioner from just any store and they never detangle my hair. My niece told me I needed to try a "hair mask." I had never heard of it but she swears by it. So I decided to give it a try. You guys, it really works. You have to follow the directions though and put it on your hair longer than what the bottle says. The more damaged your hair is, the longer you should keep it on. I left mine on for a long while.. I cant even remember how long. I think maybe 30 minutes? Anyhow, when I washed it off, my hair actually was actually easier to comb through. I wish I could find conditioners like this though b/c I don't want to spend so much washing my hair! leave on longer and it will be smoother PARWIN BEAUTY Curling Wand 5 in 1 Curling Iron Set with 5 Interchangeable Ceramic Barrels 0.5” to 1.25” Hair Curling Wand Set, Rose Gold PARWIN PRO BEAUTY {'Brand': 'PARWIN PRO BEAUTY', 'Hair Type': 'All, Curly, Fine, Normal', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Size': '1 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Package Dimensions': '10.1 x 4.8 x 3.2 inches; 2.55 Pounds', 'UPC': '658709253601', 'Manufacturer': 'PARWIN BEAUTY'} I returned this. Not worth it. was not as expected. Can't get a response returned Mini Rubber Bands Soft Elastic Bands for Kids Hair Non-slip Rubber Hair Bands Soft Hair Elastics Ties Bands Braids Hair for Girls - STRONG - REUSEABLE (Colorful1000+Black1000) OLEWELL {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'OLEWELL', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 1 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SML'} I for these to use for the ends of my side ponytail. When I use my regular bands. They are just too big and bulky and they tangle up.

So good thing about these are:
- they do not tangle my hair
- they stretch a bit but not too much
- they give you a ton of them so you don’t feel bad losing them

Con:
- they break fairly easy Breaks fairly easy but you can plenty of them LANGE HAIR Extendé Conditioning Detangler Hair Spray - Paraben Free Leave-in Conditioner Spray, Detangles and Hydrates Hair, Moisture & Shine | 4OZ {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Curly, Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Helps protect color and reinforces strands, leaving them strong and vibrant', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 1.4 x 1.4 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '793150592708'} I have the worst tangled hair ever from all the highlights and dying it I've done over the last 15 years. My hair is so damaged. And also because it is so long, it's almost impossible to manager. I also have a TON of hair. When I go to the salon, they usually have two people blow drying my hair. Anyhow, I have a detanger brush, I've bought hair mask, I've used leave in conditioner, and I've used different detanglers. (I've done the it's the 10 product also). I have to say I was very impressed with this bottle. Right off when I sprayed it, I noticed it came out different. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Type:** Prefers products for dry, damaged, and chemically treated hair, with specific concerns about oiliness at the roots and dryness at the ends.
- **Product Interests:** Focused on hair treatments, particularly masks for deep conditioning and hydration. Recently made a purchase that highlights an interest in leave-in conditioning sprays, indicating a preference for multifunctional products. Continued interest in non-slip elastic bands illustrates adaptability in styling accessories.
- **Usage Behavior:** Open to trying new products, especially with positive recommendations, while being discerning based on past experiences. Recently expressed satisfaction with a detangling product that effectively mitigated hair tangling, despite previous disappointments.
- **Application Preferences:** Willing to modify application times and values following directions closely for optimal results, showcasing a thoughtful approach to hair care and styling.
- **Value Sensitivity:** Seeks effective and affordable solutions, expressing frustration over the performance of more expensive items. The desire for value is underscored by feedback on prior purchases that did not meet expectations.
- **Brand Loyalty:** Open to exploring various brands, demonstrating a willingness to try different products for better hair management while remaining cautious about investing in new styling tools.

Overall, the user is dedicated to discovering effective, budget-friendly hair care solutions that focus on repairing and hydrating damaged hair while increasingly integrating practical styling accessories into their routine, emphasizing quality and durability.
